comment.author: 52888316@N07
comment._content: I used to own this image and it actually had an identification when I bought it.  The background on this image is that I bought it from Heritage Auctions and the soldier was Id'd as Philip Nail.  They advertised him as a member of the 42nd NC Infantry.  When I looked him up in the CW database, I found a Philip Nail in the 13th NC Infantry.  I thought both possibilities were wrong because of the lone "3" on his hat.  I never even thought about the fact that the 3rd NC Volunteers were the same as the 13th NC Infantry.  I believe this soldier is absolutely Philip Nail of the 13th NC Infantry.

comment.author: 35075914@N06
comment._content: Thanks. We received this information last week and have updated the catalog record in our online catalog. The information will appear in Flickr after it is next updated.
